```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE, paged.print=FALSE}
rmarkdown::render("article.Rmd", clean = T, quiet = T)
rmarkdown::render("kappe.Rmd", clean = T, quiet = T)
unlink("article.pdf")
unlink("kappe.pdf")
tx  <- readLines("kappe.tex")
index <- grep("\\\\begin\\{document", tx)
tx2  <- tx[-c(1:index, length(tx))]
writeLines(tx2, con = "kappe.tex")
tx  <- readLines("article.tex")
index <- grep("\\\\begin\\{document", tx)
tx2  <- tx[-c(1:index, length(tx))]
writeLines(tx2, con = "article.tex")
tx  <- readLines("resource/frontpage.tex")
writeLines(tx, con = "frontpage.tex")
rm(tx)
rm(tx2)
```
